verses.text: And it shall come to pass, when all these things are come upon thee, the blessing and the curse, which I have set before thee, and thou shalt call \add them\add* to mind among all the nations, whither the \sc Lord\sc* thy God hath driven thee,
and shalt return unto the \sc Lord\sc* thy God, and shalt obey his voice according to all that I command thee \add this\add* day, thou and thy children, with all thine heart, and with all thy soul;
that then the \sc Lord\sc* thy God will turn thy captivity, and have compassion upon thee, and will return and gather thee from all the nations, whither the \sc Lord\sc* thy God hath scattered thee.
If \add any\add* of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of heaven, from thence will the \sc Lord\sc* thy God gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee:
and the \sc Lord\sc* thy God will bring thee into the land which thy fathers possessed, and thou shalt possess it; and he will do thee good, and multiply thee above thy fathers.
And the \sc Lord\sc* thy God will circumcise thine heart, and the heart of thy seed, to love the \sc Lord\sc* thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul, that thou mayest live.
And the \sc Lord\sc* thy God will put all these curses upon thine enemies, and on them that hate thee, which persecuted thee.
And thou shalt return and obey the voice of the \sc Lord\sc*, and do all his commandments which I command thee \add this\add* day.

And the \sc Lord\sc* thy God will make thee plenteous in every work of thine hand, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy cattle, and in the fruit of thy land, for good: for the \sc Lord\sc* will again rejoice over thee for good, as he rejoiced over thy fathers:

if thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the \sc Lord\sc* thy God, to keep his commandments and his statutes which are written in this book of the law, \add and\add* if thou turn unto the \sc Lord\sc* thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul.
For this commandment which I command thee \add this\add* day, it \add is\add* not hidden from thee, neither \add is\add* it far off.
It \add is\add* not in heaven, that \add thou\add* shouldest say, Who shall go up for us to heaven, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
Neither \add is\add* it beyond the sea, that \add thou\add* shouldest say, Who shall go over the sea for us, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
But the word \add is\add* very nigh unto thee, in thy mouth, and in thy heart, that \add thou\add* mayest do it.
See, I have set before thee \add this\add* day life and good, and death and evil;

in that I command thee \add this\add* day to love the \sc Lord\sc* thy God, to walk in his ways, and to keep his commandments and his statutes and his judgments, that thou mayest live and multiply: and the \sc Lord\sc* thy God shall bless thee in the land whither thou goest to possess it.
But if thine heart turn away, so that thou wilt not hear, but shalt be drawn away, and worship other gods, and serve them;
I denounce unto you \add this\add* day, that ye shall surely perish, \add and that\add* ye shall not prolong \add your\add* days upon the land, whither thou passest over Jordan to go to possess it.

I call heaven and earth to record \add this\add* day against you, \add that\add* I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that \add both\add* thou and thy seed may live:

that thou mayest love the \sc Lord\sc* thy God, \add and\add* that thou mayest obey his voice, and that thou mayest cleave unto him: for he \add is\add* thy life, and the length of thy days: that thou mayest dwell in the land which the \sc Lord\sc* sware unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, to give them.
